original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: Switzerland offers immunity to Vladimir Putin for potential Ukraine peace talks, defying an International Criminal Court warrant. The Swiss Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis stated that under certain conditions, Putin would be allowed to attend peace talks in Switzerland, citing Switzerland's special role and Geneva's status as the European headquarters of the UN. The offer comes amidst ongoing discussions for a peace summit, with French President Emmanuel Macron also expressing interest in hosting the summit in a neutral country like Switzerland.</s>
